name: Rich Geezer
overview: Access to the feature game is via a seven stage trail with a bonus at position 4. The trail over-runs into the win-plan. On completing the trail to position 8 or above, the player can choose to collect the win or gamble hi-lo in an all or nothing gamble. After one or more successful hi-lo gambles the option to exchange for the feature game becomes available. A bonus hi-lo number is awarded on a random basis.
